metadata.title: CVE-2019-19317 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: lookupName in resolve.c in SQLite 3.30.1 omits bits from the colUsedbitmask in the case of a generated column, which allows attackers to causea denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
